participant_1.background:
My new job in the medical field is much more fulfilling than my old job as a tour guide.
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
i cannot whistle.
I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
I wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.

participant_2.background:
I like to go swimming in the lake with my family to recapture the feeling of being a carefree kid again.
i am trying to play in a local band.
i am still single at the age of 35.
i m on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
i work in fast food.

content.text: Hi! I am on my way to work. I work in the medical field. It is very fulfilling.
Hello. I am on my way to UC Santa Cruz. I just got accepted.
That's great! I wish I had gone to college. I work in the medical field now, but I was a tour guide before.
I am still single at 35. I hope to find the love of my life.
I am not much of a social media person, I just focus on my work and my hobbies.
I like to go swimming in the lake with my family. It's nice to recapture that feeling of being a carefree kid again.
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
I am trying to play in a local band.
I wake up and greet my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
What kind of dog do you have?
He is a Golden Retriever. He is so friendly and loving.
I love Golden Retrievers. They are great dogs.
